Package com.atakmap.android.nightvision

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NightVisionMapWidget
    Creates and assigns the map widget using the Icon class
    NightVisionMapWidgetComponent
    a Map Widget used to display an icon that catches press events and long press events when a user pressed the widget the current dim value of Night Vision application is engaged, when long pressing widget open a seekbar in the center bottom of the current map view.
    NightVisionNotification
    a notification class that handles the creation and display of the notification system for controlling NV mode in ATAK using a outside source that is controlled via the system.
    NightVisionPreferenceFragment
    "
    NightVisionReceiver
    Broadcast Receiver that intercepts intent calls to show the adjustment seekbar on the map view- allowing a user to adjust the dim value from within atak giving them more customization
